knimeNode.name: List Remote Files
knimeNode.shortDescription: List the files contained in a directory.

fullDescription.intro: This node lists the files that are contained in the specified directory. The location of the directory can either be local (if no connection information is given) or on a remote server.
fullDescription.option: The directory that should be listed.
If this is selected the files contained in subfolders will also be listed.

ports.inPort: Port object containing the connection information to the server. (Optional)
ports.outPort: Table containing the list of files that are present in the directory.
